languages.text: {n}Экипаж с восторгом и ужасом взирает на великана, возвышающегося над окружающими вас людьми. Кто-то складывает руки аквилой, кто-то валится на колени с молитвой Богу-Императору на устах. Кажется, Ульфара ничуть не волнует эта волна религиозного трепета — посмеиваясь в бороду, он с любопытством озирается вокруг.{/n}

{n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Экипаж с восторгом и ужасом взирает на великана, возвышающегося над окружающими вас людьми. Кажется, Ульфара ничуть не волнует эта волна религиозного трепета — посмеиваясь в бороду, он с любопытством озирается вокруг.{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有船员盯着人群之中身材壮硕的巨人，目光中充满了恐惧与敬畏。有的人在胸前比着双头鹰手势，还有的人跪倒在地，口中嘴里念念有词地向神皇祈祷。这些虔诚之人震惊的样子丝毫没有让乌尔法失去分寸。他仅仅是抿着嘴笑了笑，好奇地环顾四周。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有船员盯着人群之中身材壮硕的巨人，目光中充满了恐惧与敬畏。有的人在胸前比着双头鹰手势，还有的人跪倒在地，口中嘴里念念有词地向神皇祈祷。这些虔诚之人震惊的样子丝毫没有让乌尔法失去分寸。他仅仅是抿着嘴笑了笑，好奇地环顾四周。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Crew starrt ehrfürchtig und entsetzt auf den Riesen, der die Menge überragt. Einige machen auf der Brust das Zeichen des Adlers, andere fallen auf die Knie und beten zum Gottimperator. Diese Welle des frommen Schocks scheint Ulfar nicht im Mindestens zu verstören. Er lacht nur leise in seinen Bart und blickt sich neugierig um.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}

Einige machen auf der Brust das Zeichen des Adlers, andere fallen auf die Knie und beten zum Gottimperator. Diese Welle des frommen Schocks scheint Ulfar nicht im Mindestens zu verstören. Er lacht nur leise in seinen Bart und blickt sich neugierig um.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'équipage regarde avec autant d'ébahissement que de terreur le géant qui domine la foule de toute sa taille. Certains font le signe de l'Aquila sur leur poitrine tandis que d'autres tombent à genoux, une prière à l'Empereur-Dieu aux lèvres. Cette vague de piété mêlée d'émoi ne semble absolument pas perturber Ulfar, qui se contente de rire dans sa barbe devant la scène.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}

Certains font le signe de l'Aquila sur leur poitrine tandis que d'autres tombent à genoux, une prière à l'Empereur-Dieu aux lèvres. Cette vague de piété mêlée d'émoi ne semble absolument pas perturber Ulfar, qui se contente de rire dans sa barbe devant la scène.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tripulación mira con asombro y terror al gigante que se yergue sobre la muchedumbre. Algunos hacen el signo del Aquila sobre sus pechos y otros caen de rodillas, rezando al Dios Emperador. Estas oleadas de pía sorpresa no parecen incomodar a Ulfar, que se limita a reírse y mirar a su alrededor con curiosidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}

Algunos hacen el signo del Aquila sobre sus pechos y otros caen de rodillas, rezando al Dios Emperador. Estas oleadas de pía sorpresa no parecen incomodar a Ulfar, que se limita a reírse y mirar a su alrededor con curiosidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乗組員たちは、群衆の上にそびえ立つ巨人を畏怖と恐怖の眼差しで見つめる。ある者は胸にアクィラの印を抱き、ある者は膝をついて神帝陛下に祈りを捧げる。この敬虔な衝撃の波に、ウルファーは少しも動揺していない様子だ。彼はにやりと笑い、不思議そうに周囲を見回すだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd. Some make the sign of the Aquila on their chests, others collapse to their knees with a prayer to the God-Emperor on their lips. This wave of pious shock does not seem to discompose Ulfar in the slightest — he just chuckles into his beard and glances around curiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乗組員たちは、群衆の上にそびえ立つ巨人を畏怖と恐怖の眼差しで見つめる。ある者は胸にアクィラの印を抱き、ある者は膝をついて神帝陛下に祈りを捧げる。この敬虔な衝撃の波に、ウルファーは少しも動揺していない様子だ。彼はにやりと笑い、不思議そうに周囲を見回すだけだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mürettebat, kalabalığın üzerine dikilmiş devi şaşkınlıkla izliyor. Kimisi göğsünde Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yaparken başkaları, diz çöküp fısıldayarak Tanrı İmparator'a dua ediyor. Bu dinî hayret durumu, bıyık altından gülüp merakla etrafa bakınan Ulfar'ı hiç tedirgin etmiyor sanki.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crew stares in awe and terror at the giant towering over the crowd.
